name: Any Character - Confusion
effect:
Avoids all attacks from 1 Teamwork card, or Target Character must discard 1 Placed Teamwork card.
One per deck.

name: Any Character - Death from Above
effect:
Parademons swoop in and make a level 4 Fighting attack! Any character may make 1 additional attack.
One per deck.

name: Any Character - Guardian Angel
effect:
The Guardian gives warning. Any character may avoid 1 attack.
One per deck.

name: Any Character - Wizard in Top Hat and Tails
effect:
Exchange this card for any 1 card in Dead Pile. Counts as Duplicate of all "Any Hero/Character" BQ Specials.
One per deck.

name: Any Mission - JLCF (Sovereign Seven)
effect: Remove one hit from the Permanent Record of all characters with an Inherent Ability.

Justice League Case File

To fight on, Crusade, Cruiser, Finale, Indigo, Network, Rampart, and Reflex escape to Earth.

name: Aquaman
effect: May have duplicate "Allies From the Deep" Specials.

name: Aquaman - Allies from the Deep
effect: Play this card in front of Aquaman, Aquaman may not be attacked until this Special is attacked. Aquaman may not defend this card.

name: Aquaman - Dolphin
effect: Acts as a level 5 Energy attack. Aquaman may play 1 additional Special card.

name: Aquaman - Hook
effect: Acts as a level 7 Fighting attack.

name: Aquaman - King of the Seas
effect: Avoid 1 attack.

name: Aquaman - Line
effect:
Target character must discard all Placed cards and may not attack for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Azrael - Know My Wrath
effect:
Acts as a level 10 Fighting attack.
One per deck.

name: Bane - Intellectual Superiority
effect:
Acts as a level 9 Energy or Intellect attack.
One per deck.

name: Batman - The Dark Knight
effect: Opponent's team may not use Intellect Power cards level 6 through 8 to attack for remainder of battle.

name: Black Adam
effect: Teammate must play one Special card.

name: Black Canary
effect: May Place and play any Hero Intellect Ally cards.

name: Black Canary - Bird of Prey
effect: Acts as a level 4 Fighting attack. May make 1 additional attack.

name: Black Canary - Opening Flower Discipline
effect: Acts as a level 5 Strength attack. If successful, Target character -2 to defense for remainder of battle.

name: Black Canary - Street Smarts
effect:
Black Canary may look at top 6 cards in opponent's Draw Pile.
One per deck.

name: Black Canary - The Oracle Connection
effect: Acts as a level 5 Intellect attack. Black Canary may play 1 additional Special card.

name: Black Canary - Working Clothes
effect: Avoid 1 attack made with a Universe card.

name: Blue Beetle
effect: Team is +2 to Venture Total per battle.

name: Blue Beetle - Airgun
effect: Acts as a level 3 Energy attack. Can only be defended by a card with a Strength icon.

name: Blue Beetle - Bwah-Ha-Ha-Ha
effect: Acts as a level 6 Intellect attack. If successful, opponent -4 to Venture total.

name: Blue Beetle - Frictionless Foam
effect: Opponent must discard all Placed Universe cards, and is -3 to Venture total.

name: Blue Beetle - Quick Wits
effect: Avoid any attack made with a Power card.

name: Blue Beetle - The Bug
effect: Blue Beetle may have an unlimited number of Special cards Placed on him until Blue Beetle is KO'd. Specials may not be duplicates.

name: Booster Gold
effect: Intellect Power cards are +3 when used for defense.

name: Booster Gold - Energy Absorption Field
effect:
Avoid 1 attack with an Energy icon. No Energy Power cards may be played against Booster Gold's team for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Booster Gold - Gauntlet Energy Blast
effect: Acts as a level 4 Energy attack. May make 1 additional attack.

name: Booster Gold - Midas Mode
effect: Booster Gold may play any Energy or Strength Teamwork cards for remainder of game.

name: Booster Gold - Quarterback Sneak
effect: Acts as a level 6 Strength attack, may be used against character in Reserve, who may defend.

name: Booster Gold - Skeets
effect:
Choose 1 Power card usable by Booster Gold from Power Pack and Place in hand. May be duplicate. Reshuffle Power Pack.
One per deck.

name: Brainiac - Brain Drain
effect:
Acts as a level 8 Intellect attack. If successful Target must immediately discard 1 Placed card, of Brainiac's choice.
One per deck.

name: Captain Atom
effect: May play Fighting Teamwork cards from Reserve.

name: Captain Atom - Anti-Gravity Field
effect:
Captain Atom may not attack or be attacked with Basic Universe cards for remainder of game.
One per deck.

name: Captain Atom - Atomic Bolt
effect:
Acts as a level 9 Energy or Fighting attack.
One per deck.

name: Captain Atom - Atomic Punch
effect: Acts as a level 4 Strength attack. May make 1 additional attack.

name: Captain Atom - Quantum Jump
effect:
Remove all Hits from Captain Atom's Permanent Record and Current Battle, and switch Places with the Reserve.
One per deck.

name: Captain Atom - Skin Alloy
effect: Captain Atom gains a +2 to defense for remainder of battle.

name: Captain Marvel
effect: May play "Speed of Mercury" from Reserve.

name: Captain Marvel - Power of Zeus
effect: Negates the effect of any 1 Special card played by opponent against Captain Marvel only.

name: Captain Marvel - Speed of Mercury
effect:
Captain Marvel's Fighting Rating increases to 7 for remainder of game.
One per deck.

name: Captain Marvel - Stamina of Atlas
effect:
Any cards with more than 1 icon on Captain Marvel's Permanent Record become Any-Power cards for the remainder of the game.
One per deck.

name: Captain Marvel - Strength of Hercules
effect: Acts as a level 6 Strength attack. Cannot be defended by a card with an Energy icon.

name: Captain Marvel - The Marvel Family
effect: Acts as a level 3 Energy, Fighting, Strength, or Intellect attack. Captain Marvel may play 1 additional Special card.

name: Catwoman - Prowling by Night
effect: Avoids all attacks from 1 Teamwork card, or Target Character must discard 1 Placed Teamwork card.

name: Cheetah
effect: Teammate must play one Special card.

name: Comm. Gordon - The Bat Signal
effect: Comm. Gordon may Place and play Batman "Master Detective" and "The Dark Knight" Special cards for remainder of game.

name: Cyborg - Interstellar Menace
effect:
Target character must discard all Placed cards and may not attack for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Darkseid - Desaad
effect: Acts as a level 5 Intellect attack. Darkseid may play 1 additional Special card.

name: Darkseid - Granny Goodness
effect: Play during battle. For remainder of battle, all Fighting bonuses from Teamwork cards are doubled.

name: Darkseid - Kalibak
effect: Play this card in front of Darkseid. Darkseid may not be attacked until this Special is attacked. Darkseid may not defend this card.

name: Darkseid - Lord of Apokolips
effect:
Darkseid may make 4 attacks, 3 attacks at +1 each, 2 attacks at +2 each, or 1 attack at +3. Bonus not applied to damage, or Venture Total.
One per deck.

name: Darkseid - Omega Effect
effect:
Acts as a level 7 Intellect attack. If successful, Target character may not attack for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Doctor Polaris
effect: Power cards are +1 when used for defense.

name: Doctor Polaris - Black Hole Force Beam
effect:
Target character's Hits to KO number is decreased by 5 points for remainder of game.
One per deck.

name: Doctor Polaris - Force of Nature
effect: Play during battle. At end of battle, Opponent may not move any Mission cards from the Defeated Missions Pile.

name: Doctor Polaris - Magnetic Energy Bolt
effect: Acts as a level 4 Fighting or Strength attack.

name: Doctor Polaris - Magnetic Sphere
effect: Avoid 1 attack.

name: Doctor Polaris - Make the Blood Boil
effect:
Acts as a level 7 Any-Power attack. If successful, acts as a level 0 Energy, Fighting, Strength or Intellect power card.
One per deck.

name: Doomsday - Engine of Destruction
effect:
Sort through opponent's Draw Pile. Choose any 1 card and remove it from the game. Reshuffle Draw Pile.
One per deck.

effect: Must combine with Strength Power card level 1 through 4 for a single attack or defense.

effect:

effect:

Draw 3 cards. Discard duplicates.

effect:
Sort through opponent's Draw Pile. Choose any 1 card and remove it from the game. Reshuffle the Draw Pile.

effect: The Joker may avoid any numerical attack.

effect: Acts as a level 6 intellect attack. Cannot be defended by a card with an Intellect icon.

Knockout may switch any two Power cards of equal value, on the Permanent Record of any of two of opponent's Characters.

effect: Teammate must play one Special card.

effect:
Remove any cards from Lex Luthor's Draw Pile and discard into Dead Pile. Reshuffle Draw Pile.

effect: Teammates' Training card bonuses' are an additional +1.

effect:

name: Martian Manhunter - Malleable Form
effect: Target opponent may not attack Martian Manhunter for remainder of battle unless he attacks him first.

effect: Acts as a level 4 Any-Power attack, may combine with 1 Energy, Fighting, Strength, or Intellect Power card for a single attack.

effect:
All Any-Power cards on target character's Permanent Record become Energy cards for remainder of game.

effect: Acts as a level 5 Energy attack. If successful, Target character may not attack Martian Manhunter for remainder of battle.

effect:

effect: Teammate must play one Special card.

effect: Avoid 1 attack.

effect: May only be Spectrum KO'd by four Power Types.

effect:

effect: Acts as a level 5 Strength attack. Mister Miracle may play 1 additional Special card.

effect:
Discard 1 Power card usable by Mister Miracle to remove all Hits from Mister Miracle's Permanent Record of equal or lesser value.

effect: Mister Miracle may not attack or be attacked for remainder of battle.

name: Mister Miracle - Super-Escape Artist
effect: No Special cards may be played against Mister Miracle for remainder of battle.

name: Neron - Lord of the Underworld
effect:
All attacks made on Neron are made on Target teammate until teammate is KO'd. Teammate may defend.

name: Neron - Necromantic Blast
effect: Acts as a level 2 Energy attack. If successful, acts as a level 8 Fighting Power card.

name: Neron - Seduction of the Innocent
effect: Opponent must discard all Placed Ally cards, and is -3 to Venture total.

name: Neron - Your Heart's Desire
effect:
Choose 1 Special card not usable by Neron from Draw Pile and Place in hand. May not be a "One Per Deck". May be duplicate. Reshuffle Draw Pile.
One per deck.

name: Neron - Your Soul is Mine
effect: Acts as a level 6 Intellect attack. If successful, Target character must discard 2 cards of opponent's choice. Cards may be Placed or in hand.

name: Nightwing - Ties That Bind
effect: Nightwing may Place and play Robin "Loyal Partner" and Batman "The Dark Knight" Special cards for remainder of game.

name: Nuklon and Obsidian
effect: Teammate must play one Special card.

name: Ocean Master
effect: Teammate must play one Special card.

effect: Acts as a level 6 Any-Power card. May be used to attack or defend. May not be combined with Universe cards.

effect: Play as Orion concedes battle. Orion's team may discard 3 cards to top of Draw Pile.

name: Orion - Consult the Source
effect:
All Any-Power cards on Target character's Permanent Record become Intellect cards for remainder of game.
One per deck.

name: Orion - Mother Box
effect:
Discard 1 Power card usable by Orion to remove all Hits from Orion's Permanent Record of equal or lesser value.
One per deck.

name: Orion - Source of the Beast
effect: Acts as a level 4 Energy, Strength, Fighting, or Intellect attack. May make 1 additional attack.

name: Parallax
effect: Characters with Hero code -1 to attack Parallax in 1st battle.

effect:
Acts as a level 2 Energy, Fighting, Strength or Intellect attack. Can only be defended by a defensive Special card.
One per deck.

name: Parallax - Heroic Redemption
effect: All Hits with only Energy icons in the Permanent Record of all Front Line teammates are moved to the Permanent Record of Parallax.

name: Parallax - In Blackest Night
effect: Parallax gains +2 to defense for remainder of battle.

name: Parallax - In Brightest Day
effect: Acts as a level 4 Energy attack. May make 1 additional attack.

name: Parallax - Zero Hour
effect:
Play during battle. At the end of the battle, all Hits from The Current Battle for all characters are discarded and not added to the Permanent Record.
One per deck.

name: Parasite - Doc Parasite
effect:
Remove 1 hit from the permanent record of The Parasite or teammate for every card in the Defeated Missions Pile.
One per deck.

name: Penguin - Gotham's Emperor Penguin
effect:
Acts as a level 11 Intellect attack, The Penguin may not attack for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Poison Ivy - Blowing You a Kiss
effect:
Poison Ivy may not be attacked for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Power A6 (Justice League)
effect:
Does not count for Spectrum KO.
One per deck.

name: Ra's Al Ghul - The Clench
effect:
Opponent's team's Hits to K.O. number is decreased by 3 points for remainder of battle.
One per deck.

name: Requiem
effect: Teammate must play one Special card.

name: Riddler - Prince of Puzzles
effect:
The Riddler may exchange remaining cards in hand with equal number of cards from the top of the Draw Pile. May keep Duplicates.
One per deck.

name: Robin - Surfing the Net
effect:
Discard one Intellect Power card usable by Robin to draw 4 cards from top of the Draw Pile. May keep duplicates.
One per deck.

effect: Teammate must play one Special card.

name: Steel - Night Vision Goggles
effect:
Draw 3 cards. Discard duplicates.
One per deck.

name: Superboy - The Ravers
effect: Acts as a level 3 Fighting attack, each Front Line teammate may make one additional attack.

name: Supergirl - Girl of Steel
effect:
Acts as a level 9 Fighting or Strength attack.
One per deck.

name: Superman - The Man Beyond Tomorrow
effect:
Acts as a level 11 Any-Power attack. Does not count toward Spectrum KO.
One per deck.

name: The Brave and the Bold - JLCF (Aquaman,Deep Six)
effect: All Inherent Abilities that have a + to defense receive an additional +1 this battle.

Justice League Case File

Far undersea, the mighty Aquaman is the Deep-Six's prey. Even the oceans are not safe from the menace of Darkseid!

name: The Brave and the Bold - JLCF (Batman,Kanto)
effect: One Front Line character of your choice is immediately KO'd. Reserve character immediately moves into play. Card is discarded if it will end game.

Justice League Case File

Gotham City's back streets witness an epic battle as Kanto, the cunning and treacherous leader of Darkseid's vanguard, clashes with the Darknight Detective Batman!

name: The Brave and the Bold - JLCF (Blue Beetle,Glorious Godfrey)
effect: Choose one of opponent's Front Line characters. All attacks against chosen character are at +1 this battle.

Justice League Case File

Thirsty for revenge, Glorious Godfrey uses his hypnotic voice to make crows attack the Blue Beetle. Beetle helped foil Godfrey's schemes in years past-but can he triumph now?

name: The Brave and the Bold - JLCF (Darkseid's Elite)
effect: All Inherent Abilities that have a + to attack receive an additional +1 this battle.

Justice League Case File

In Gotham City, the vanguard of Darkseid's invasion force-his lethal Elite-arrives via Boom Tube. Their assignment: kill those heroes remaining on Earth, eliminating all obstacles to their evil master's plans!

name: The Brave and the Bold - JLCF (Green Arrow,Black Canary,Amazing Grace)
effect: Move the Reserve character to the Front Line this battle. Return that character to Reserve at the end of the battle.

Justice League Case File

Lovely as she is evil, Amazing Grace hunts Earth's female heroes, starting with Black Canary. But even Green Arrow's help may not be enough defeat Apokolips' femme fatale...

effect: Acts as a level 2 Strength attack. May make 2 additional attacks.

effect: Acts as a level 7 Strength attack.

The Ray plays numerical attacks face down for remainder of battle. Opponent must guess defense.

effect: Acts as a level 4 Intellect attack. May make 1 additional attack.

Target character must choose 1 card from The Trickster's hand. If card is an attack, Target is Hit. If not, chosen card is discarded to the Power Pack.

effect:

effect: Wonder Woman may avoid any numerical attack.

effect: Teammate may avoid 1 attack of 9 or less.

effect:

name: Zauriel
effect: Teammate must play one Special card.
